about_the_game:
In the shade of massive cliffs, among the trees accustomed to tall, lie the houses of a tiny settlement in peaceful silence. Maybe too quiet. The buildings are all furnished but uninhabited; the dust has not yet struck the objects. The door to the last house in the village is ominously wide open. Behind it is the furniture of a shattered tavern lying on the ground. The living quarters and the pantry are covered with cobwebs, and a massive hole in the back wall of the building leads into a dark cave...

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

name: RPGScenery - Spider Cave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
